Coach James Franklin runs in after the half to address the team at Beaver Stadium on Saturday Oct PERIOD   PERIOD

In Tuesdays weekly press conference James Franklin gave an injury update on two of Penn States star players PERIOD

Franklin said that he  Noah Cain and John Reid to play against Minnesota on Saturday PERIOD

Both players suffered injuries in Penn States victory over Michigan State which caused them to leave the game and not return PERIOD
